label: Community Recreation Planning
description: Studies the outdoor recreational use of lands in the public domain and their planning, concepts, and processes related to planning resource based systems; multiple-use in planning; planning criteria for outdoor recreation facilities. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: Junior standing; or consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: Junior standing; or consent of instructor.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to students with Junior or Senior class standing.
